s.text: A Helms spokesperson, says the Times , responded this way: "Senator Helms would never suggest doing anything harmful to farmers in Indiana."
And should that matter, or should the Post 's editors give rich Russians the came courtesy they give poor blacks?
Another: One day the Devil meets a new Russian capitalist and offers him anything he wants.
Oddly, Woodward doesn't mention the similarity between this episode and the sudden re-appearance in the White House living quarters of Hillary Clinton's Whitewater billing records.
